channel.title: Moparisthebest.com's BAND!
channel.description:
Lets have some fun, lets make a band!
We need a guitarist, a bassist, a drummer, and vocalist!
Im the manager (H). We can name the bands and everything it be sooo much fun PMG. good night it lates.

item.title: Moparisthebest.com's BAND!
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:14, topic:20222”]yea you guys can just record onto Adobe Audition or something, then post your project file, and get somebody whos really good with Audition (or whatever program your using) to put it all together.
This would be kinda hard, but if you get everybody to use a metranome at the same speed and make sure everybody is tuned correctly, it could end up nice
I could play lead or rythym ;)[/quote]

I covered the guitars, but vocals and drums would sound like shit over a mic.
but nobody really gives a shit. Whoever does this, it will just be for fun and to screw around. I dont think anybody is aiming for a record deal here.

(with guitars, you can just get a cable from radio shack and hook it up straight into your computer where a mic would go. it sounds almost studio quality)

Read full topic

item.title: Moparisthebest.com's BAND!
item.dc:creator: @Omfgurweird Omfgurweird
item.description:
@Omfgurweird wrote:

Here’s one problem you guys might not of thought about. You need a recording system, and not just using a mic from your pc… That would sound like shit. And for drummers, you would need a recording system plus a bunch of mic’s. Even if you guys make some of the music and put it all together, it won’t be good quality at all. Sorry to kill it, but it had to be done.

Read full topic
